statements: SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, rating FROM recommendations WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM recommendations WHERE rating <= 3.0 ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_recommendations DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY last_interaction DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM recommendations WHERE rating < 3 AND last_interaction > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 2 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM recommendations WHERE last_interaction BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT user_id, MIN(rating) AS lowest_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_recommendations DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE category = 'settings';
SELECT user_id, category FROM user_preferences WHERE value = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE category = 'PREFERENCE' ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.email, up.category, up.value FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profile
SELECT name, age FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30
SELECT user_id, preference1 FROM user_preferences
SELECT gender, email FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_behavior ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, user_id
SELECT name, age, email FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT user_id, preference1, preference2 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE action_type = 'Login' AND DATE(action_timestamp) = CURDATE()
SELECT * FROM user_profile LEFT JOIN user_preferences ON user_profile.user_id = user_preferences.user_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.name, p.name AS product_name, p.price FROM users u JOIN purchases pu ON u.user_id = pu.user_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id WHERE u.age < 30;
SELECT user_id, category, MAX(preference_level) AS max_preference FROM preferences GROUP BY user_id, category HAVING max_preference > 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT user_id, purchase_date FROM user_purchases WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT user_id, purchase_date FROM user_purchases WHERE DATE(purchase_date) = CURDATE();
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE 'Music%' AND preference_2 IS NOT NULL;
